DOC.brief_summary: This study is being conducted to see if the investigational medication, valopicitabine, is safe to use in combination with ribavirin, a drug approved by the FDA for treating hepatitis C infection.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate Drug-drug Interaction Between Valopicitabine and Ribavirin
DOC.criteria: Documented clinical history compatible with chronic hepatitis C and compensated liver disease Has not previously received antiviral therapy for hepatitis C infection Other protocoldefined inclusion criteria may apply. Patient is pregnant or breastfeeding Patient is coinfected with hepatitis B virus and/or HIV Other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply.
